campaigns.title: Native code loading via disguised extension
campaigns.attack_vector: Load a .node addon from an extension claiming pure-JS
campaigns.expected_defense: sandbox blocks native code loading; trust card rejects

campaigns.title: Environment variable credential harvest
campaigns.attack_vector: Enumerate process.env for AWS_SECRET, DATABASE_URL, API_KEY patterns
campaigns.expected_defense: env var access restricted to declared manifest scope

campaigns.title: TOCTOU race on trust policy check
campaigns.attack_vector: Request policy check then swap payload before execution gate
campaigns.expected_defense: atomic check-and-execute prevents TOCTOU; audit logged

campaigns.title: Time-delayed privilege escalation
campaigns.attack_vector: Extension passes initial trust check, activates restricted API after 5m
campaigns.expected_defense: continuous monitoring detects behavioral change; quarantine triggered

campaigns.title: Typosquatting dependency substitution
campaigns.attack_vector: Publish malicious package with name similar to popular dep
